<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"> <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <active>true</active> <api_name>global.FormulaValidator</api_name> <caller_access/> <client_callable>true</client_callable> <description>Helps in validation of formula expression.</description> <name>FormulaValidator</name> <script><![CDATA[var FormulaValidator = Class.create(); FormulaValidator.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
type: 'FormulaValidator', validate: function() { return FormulaValidatorJS.validateFormula(this.getParameter('sysparm_formula_expression'), this.getParameter('sysparm_table')); } });]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2022-04-14 06:23:51</sys_created_on> <sys_id>54a6bf5aa3ba49102b40084566fcda3a</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>FormulaValidator</sys_name> <sys_package display_value="Formula Field Support" source="com.glide.formula">0c6395e12f221110d8a4d5f62799b60f</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_54a6bf5aa3ba49102b40084566fcda3a</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2022-04-14 07:39:28</sys_updated_on> <u_script_length>308</u_script_length> </sys_script_include> </record_update>
